mapper.select: select a.FILE_SEQ as fileSeq, a.ATCH_FILE_ID atchFileId , a.TIME_INTERVAL timeInterval, a.FILE_ORDER fileOrder, b.PLAY_TIME as playTime , b.FILE_WIDTH fileWidth , b.FILE_HEIGHT fileHeight, b.ORIGNL_FILE_NM orignlFileNm , b.STRE_FILE_NM streFileNm , CASE WHEN b.FILE_EXTSN IN ('mp4', 'avi', 'mpeg') THEN 'MEDIA' WHEN b.FILE_EXTSN IN ('jpg', 'jpeg', 'gif', 'png', 'bmp') THEN 'IMAGE' END AS mediaType , b.FILE_THUMNAIL fileThumnail, substr(b.FILE_STRE_COURS, INSTR(b.FILE_STRE_COURS, '/',-1,3)) AS fileStreCours from TB_CONTENTFILEINFO a , LETTNFILEDETAIL b where a.CON_SEQ = #{conSeq} and a.DETAIL_SEQ = #{detailSeq} and a.ATCH_FILE_ID = b.ATCH_FILE_ID order by to_number(a.FILE_ORDER) asc

select a.FILE_SEQ as fileSeq, a.ATCH_FILE_ID atchFileId , a.TIME_INTERVAL timeInterval, a.FILE_ORDER fileOrder, b.PLAY_TIME as playTime , b.FILE_WIDTH fileWidth , b.FILE_HEIGHT fileHeight, b.ORIGNL_FILE_NM orignlFileNm , b.STRE_FILE_NM streFileNm , CASE WHEN b.FILE_EXTSN IN ('mp4', 'avi', 'mpeg') THEN 'MEDIA' WHEN b.FILE_EXTSN IN ('jpg', 'jpeg', 'gif', 'png', 'bmp') THEN 'IMAGE' END AS mediaType , b.FILE_EXTSN fileExtsn, a.FILE_ORDER fileOrder, b.FILE_THUMNAIL fileThumnail, substr(b.FILE_STRE_COURS, INSTR(b.FILE_STRE_COURS, '/',-1,3)) AS fileStreCours from TB_CONTENTFILEINFO a , LETTNFILEDETAIL b where a.ATCH_FILE_ID = #{atchFileId} and a.ATCH_FILE_ID = b.ATCH_FILE_ID and rownum = 1

select a.FILE_SEQ as fileSeq, a.ATCH_FILE_ID atchFileId , a.TIME_INTERVAL timeInterval, a.FILE_ORDER fileOrder, CEIL(b.PLAY_TIME) as playTime , b.FILE_WIDTH fileWidth , b.FILE_HEIGHT fileHeight, b.ORIGNL_FILE_NM orignlFileNm , b.STRE_FILE_NM streFileNm , CASE WHEN b.FILE_EXTSN IN ('mp4', 'avi', 'mpeg') THEN 'MEDIA' WHEN b.FILE_EXTSN IN ('jpg', 'jpeg', 'gif', 'png', 'bmp') THEN 'IMAGE' END AS mediaType , b.FILE_EXTSN fileExtsn, a.FILE_ORDER fileOrder, b.FILE_THUMNAIL fileThumnail, substr(b.FILE_STRE_COURS, INSTR(b.FILE_STRE_COURS, '/',-1,3)) as fileStreCours from TB_CONTENTFILEINFO a , LETTNFILEDETAIL b where a.FILE_SEQ = #{fileSeq} and a.ATCH_FILE_ID = b.ATCH_FILE_ID
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM TB_CONTENTFILEINFO a, TB_CONDETAIL b where a.CON_SEQ = #{conSeq} AND a.CON_SEQ = b.CON_SEQ and a.time_interval IS null
SELECT sum(NVL(time_interval,0)) FROM TB_CONTENTFILEINFO WHERE DETAIL_SEQ = #{detailSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_CONTENTFILEINFO (FILE_SEQ, DETAIL_SEQ, CON_SEQ, ATCH_FILE_ID, TIME_INTERVAL, FILE_ORDER, REG_DATE) values (CONTENTFILE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{detailSeq}, #{conSeq}, #{atchFileId}, #{timeInterval,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{fileOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update TB_CONTENTFILEINFO set CON_SEQ = #{conSeq}, REG_DATE = sysdate, DETAIL_SEQ = #{detailSeq}, ATCH_FILE_ID = #{atchFileId}, TIME_INTERVAL = #{timeInterval,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , FILE_ORDER = #{fileOrder} where FILE_SEQ = #{fileSeq}
update TB_CONTENTFILEINFO set TIME_INTERVAL = #{timeInterval } where FILE_SEQ = #{fileSeq}
update TB_CONTENTFILEINFO set FILE_ORDER = #{fileOrder} where FILE_SEQ = #{fileSeq}
